data.title: LtU-ILI: Robust machine learning in astro
data.name: ltu-ili

evidence: "The **Learning the Universe Implicit Likelihood Inference (LtU-ILI)** pipeline is an all-in-one framework for performing machine learning parameter inference in astrophysics and cosmology."
"here's an example of training a ... network to predict a posterior over parameters y, given input data x" (shows it is run as a tool/pipeline, not just a library component).
"To install LtU-ILI, follow the instructions in [INSTALL.md](INSTALL.md)." (no mention of package managers or binaries, implying source-based installation from the repo).

checks.reason: no binaries found in the repo
